guide.title: Welcome to our video pitch builder
guide.subtext: The video builder guides you step by step to record a great video pitch.
guide.header: The video builder is split into three 30 second sections:
guide.steps:
Step 1: Introduce Yourself
Step 2: What do you aim to achieve
Step 3: Why is your project important
guide.tipsBody:
1. Film in landscape if possible.
2. Have someone help you film.
3. Practice what you are going to say before you start filming.

patch.title: We’re Building Your Video, Please Wait...
patch.subtext: We’re working hard behind the scenes to get your video finished. This usually takes around a minute, then you’ll be able to preview it before saving it.

cancel.title: Cancel video uploading
cancel.subtext: Are you sure you want to cancel the video uploading?

videoIntroduction.title: Who are we?
videoIntroduction.subtext: Please record a 30 second description of who you are and where you are from.
videoIntroduction.hints:
Tell us who you are.
Tell us about your organisation.
Tell us about the type of work that you do and where.

videoGoals.title: What do we aim to achieve?
videoGoals.step: Step 2: What do you aim to achieve
videoGoals.subtext: Please record a 30 second description of what your project aims to achieve.
videoGoals.hints:
Tell us what your goals are for this project.
Tell us what impact your project will have.
Tell us about what motivated you to develop this project.

videoSignificance.title: Why is your project important?
videoSignificance.step: Step 3: Tell about the significance of this project
videoSignificance.subtext: Please record a 30 second description of why your project is important.
videoSignificance.hints:
Tell us what will be the effect on the local community.
Tell us about how many people will benefit from you project.

landing.hero: personas cultivando árboles de la manera correcta
landing.demoMailBody:
Thank you for your interest in TerraMatch.

Please provide possible dates and times for a demonstration (please note: we require two weeks advance notice):

1) Date MM/DD/YYYY and Time: xx.xx am/pm
2) Date MM/DD/YYYY and Time: xx.xx am/pm
3) Date MM/DD/YYYY and Time: xx.xx am/pm

You will receive a reply from our team within 2 business days.
landing.title: TerraMatch
landing.whatCan: lo que TerraMatch puede hacer por usted

developers.header1: ¿USTED O SU ORGANIZACIÓN CULTIVAN ÁRBOLES? TERRAMATCH LE AYUDA:
developers.paragraph1:
Conéctese con una red global de productores y financiadores.

Acceda a financiamiento de fuentes confiables y formales para expandir sus operaciones.

Conozca mejor el mercado y lo que buscan los financiadores.

Comparta tu trabajo y los beneficios del cultivo de árboles con un público global.
developers.title: Productores

funders.header1: ¿QUIERE APOYAR A PRODUCTORES PARA CULTIVAR ÁRBOLES? TERRAMATCH LE AYUDA:
funders.paragraph1:
Conéctese con una red global de personas y organizaciones acreditadas y capacitadas que expertas en cómo cultivar árboles y asegurarse de que sobrevivan.

Identifique rápidamente proyectos que coincidan con sus necesidades específicas.

Ayude a empoderar a las comunidades rurales a mejorar sus tierras, el acceso al agua, el rendimiento de sus cultivos, las oportunidades de empleo y sus ingresos.

Meda el progreso para seguir de cerca el impacto de su inversión a lo largo del tiempo (¡próximamente!).
funders.title: financiadores

overview.paragraph1:
Los árboles ayudan a combatir el cambio climático y a transformar vidas. Es por ello que personas alrededor del mundo los están sembrando en grandes cantidades. Sin embargo, no es tan simple como sembrar cualquier tipo de árbol en cualquier lugar. Las personas y el clima se benefician únicamente si los árboles adecuados prosperan en los lugares correctos.

Afortunadamente, existen numerosos expertos a nivel local que saben cómo cultivarlos bien, pero hay un problema importante: hasta ahora no existe una forma centralizada capaz de conectar a estos innovadores con otros agentes que puedan financiar sus esfuerzos.

Después de décadas de investigación el World Resources Institute (WRI) creó TerraMatch, una plataforma global que une ambos mundos. El algoritmo único de TerraMatch combina las preferencias de los financiadores — desde la geografía hasta el tipo de suelo y mucho más — con proyectos verificados que buscan sembrar o ya están sembrando los árboles adecuados en los suelos correctos.

¿La meta? Ayudar a las personas y financiadores a cultivar un billón de árboles juntos.
overview.title: Descripción

congratulations.pitch: Congratulations on your fully funded project!
congratulations.offer: Congratulations on your fully invested offer!

congratulationsHelp.pitch:
Your project will be removed from searches and organisations won’t be able to match with it anymore. However, it will remain on your organisation’s profile for you to share your amazing news!

You can still change your funding status back should anything change.
congratulationsHelp.offer:
Your offer will be removed from searches and organisations won’t be able to match with it anymore. However, it will remain on your organisation’s profile for you to share your amazing news!

You can still change your funding status back should anything change.

projectStatus.title: Funding status
projectStatus.help: Please update us with how your project is progressing. This helps us keep the platform up to date!

visibility.title: Funding Status
visibility.subtext: Please update us with how your project is progressing. This helps us keep the platform up to date!

fullyFunded.title: Congratulations on your fully funded project!
fullyFunded.subtext:
Your project will be removed from searches and organisations won’t be able to match with it anymore. However, it will remain on your organisation’s profile for you to share your amazing news!

You can still change your funding status back should anything change.

errors.problem: There was an issue changing your password.

reset.resetSubText: Please enter your new password below.
reset.resetSuccess: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email address

verify.checkEmail: Your account has not been verified. Please check your email for your validation link we have sent you.
verify.checkEmailInvalid: There has been a problem verifying your account. Please use the link in the email we have sent you.

welcome.subtext: Thank you for signing up to TerraMatch. To get started please fill out some details about your organization. We will review these and let you know when we have built your profile so you get started using TerraMatch!
welcome.title: Welcome To TerraMatch
